INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of the hydroquinidine and risk of overdose (decrease of the renal excretion of the hydroquinidine due to alkalinizing of the urine )
Increase of the digoxinemia due to decrease of the renal clearance of the digoxin. In addition, disorders of autoregulation (excessive bradycardia and disorders of atrioventricular conduction).
Risk of tinnitis and/or loss of hearing acuity: cinchonism linked to a decrease of the hepatic metabolism of the antiarrythmic by the itraconazole
